sub_title: Retired from The Dow Chemical Company
summary:
Measurement System Analysis, Analytical Instrument Qualification, interlaboratory testing, test method validation and editing; control charts and product specifications; Mgmt Repr. ISO 9001, int. auditor ISO 9000 series, GLP QA Officer; microscopy;  thermal analysis; chemiluminescence; (photo)electrochemistry; impedance and admittance spectroscopy; photoluminescence (4K - 298K); synthesis of inorganic luminescent materials; X-ray powder diffraction; IR absorption spectra; UV-Vis reflection spectra.

Specialties: Stereology; fractal geometries; data interpretation; build theoretical models; develop statistical tools; validation statistics; unbalanced designs; counting statistics; non-normal statistical distributions: hypergeometric, (negative) binomial, Poisson, (discrete) uniform, triangular, lognormal and exponential distributions; particle size distributions; identification of single outliers, multiple outliers and variance outliers (see blog), Poisson processes and time-between-event charts.

treasury_media.title: Variance Outlier Test
treasury_media.description: Feb. 2010, I published a variance outlier test, which I called the "G test", in Analytica Chimica Acta. This journal is well appreciated by analytical chemists. However, the G test is relevant to other disciplines as well.  It is an extension of Cochran's C test, and is of potential interest to anyone who needs to decide if one or more variance (or standard deviation) estimates are extreme in comparison with a group with which they are supposed to be comparable.

Validation, capability and control of Poisson processes.
profile_positions.title: Statistical Specialist - Data Services - Continuous Improvement Center of Excellence

profile_positions.description: Develop, transfer and manage statistical technology.  Deliver a competitive advantage through enhanced data collection, visualization and interpretation.

profile_positions.description: Cooperate with Global Methods Team.  Manage and facilitate Dow's analytical and test methods process through coaching, method documentation skills, and statistical expertise so that methods produce valid and reliable results for the intended application. Review and approve method content, validation data and supporting documentation in partnership with technical and leadership personnel within a business.  Advance statistical validation tools.
